deepi module¶

start_stream()¶

Start the threaded process for updating the live stream frame

static status(self)¶
stop_stream()¶

End threaded process for updating the live stream frame

update_frame()¶

Continuous capture that saves the latest frame in memory. Any live stream applications will access this updating frame
